definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: abundance, fulness: only [[מִזִּיז כְּבוֹדָהּ]] Is 66:11 that ye may suck out and be delighted, from the abundance of her glory (i.e. of Jerusalem) (so Di al.; > Che:crit. n., and OP 472 f. Brd (cf. Ew ‘Euter’), who comp. vulg. Ar. zîza, udder (breast, teat); this suits vb. [[תָּמׂצּוּ]] and ‖[[תִּינְקוּ וּשְׂבַעְתֶּם מִשּׁׂד]], but is dub. in Heb., perh. not Shemit., v. Dozy:i. 619 a and reff.; also Lag:Proph. Chald. who proposes, plausibly, [[מִבִּיזִ]], cf. Aram. bezo0 Ps:502, [[ביזא]]; Ar. bz= pap).
